languages.text: "Вы — слишком значимая фигура, чтобы не влиять на мои планы в секторе. А значит, вы — либо мой союзник, либо враг. Предпочитаю думать, что все таки первое, так что мы еще увидимся. Постарайтесь свыкнуться с этой мыслью".

traits.locale_text: "Вы — слишком значимая фигура, чтобы не влиять на мои планы в секторе. А значит, вы — либо мой союзник, либо враг. Предпочитаю думать, что все таки первое, так что мы еще увидимся. Постарайтесь свыкнуться с этой мыслью".

languages.text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."
languages.original_text: "Вы — слишком значимая фигура, чтобы не влиять на мои планы в секторе. А значит, вы — либо мой союзник, либо враг. Предпочитаю думать, что все таки первое, так что мы еще увидимся. Постарайтесь свыкнуться с этой мыслью".

traits.locale_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think that it is the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

"You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think that it is the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

"You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

"You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

"You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

languages.text: 「お前は有名すぎる。この星域での私の計画に影響を与える。すなわち、私の敵にも味方にもなりうるということだ。お前には後者であって欲しい。また会おう。この思考に慣れるよう、努めてもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は有名すぎる。この星域での私の計画に影響を与える。すなわち、私の敵にも味方にもなりうるということだ。お前には後者であって欲しい。また会おう。この思考に慣れるよう、努めてもらいたい」

languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

languages.text: “你的地位太过重要，必然会对我在这片星区的部署带来影响。这也意味着我们要么成为盟友，要么成为敌人，不存在中间地带。我当然希望你是前者，这样我们很快就会再次见面了。希望你能尽管适应我的看法。”
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: “你的地位太过重要，必然会对我在这片星区的部署带来影响。这也意味着我们要么成为盟友，要么成为敌人，不存在中间地带。我当然希望你是前者，这样我们很快就会再次见面了。希望你能尽管适应我的看法。”

languages.text: «Es una figura demasiado importante como para no influir en mis planes para el sector, por lo que será mi aliad{mf|o|a} o mi enemig{mf|o|a}. Preferiría lo primero, por lo que volveremos a encontrarnos. Vaya haciéndose a la idea».
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: «Es una figura demasiado importante como para no influir en mis planes para el sector, por lo que será mi aliad{mf|o|a} o mi enemig{mf|o|a}. Preferiría lo primero, por lo que volveremos a encontrarnos. Vaya haciéndose a la idea».

languages.text: « Vous êtes une personnalité bien trop éminente pour ne pas avoir d'impact sur mes plans dans ce secteur. Reste à déterminer si vous êtes mon {mf|allié|alliée} ou mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie}. Inutile de préciser que je préférerais de loin vous compter parmi mes alliés, alors tâchez de vous habituer à cette idée. »
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes une personnalité bien trop éminente pour ne pas avoir d'impact sur mes plans dans ce secteur. Reste à déterminer si vous êtes mon {mf|allié|alliée} ou mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie}. Inutile de préciser que je préférerais de loin vous compter parmi mes alliés, alors tâchez de vous habituer à cette idée. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu wichtig, um keinen Einfluss auf meine Plänen im Sektor zu haben. Was bedeutet, dass wir entweder Verbündete oder Feinde sind. Mir wäre Ersteres lieber, und daher werden wir uns wiedersehen. Versucht, Euch an den Gedanken zu gewöhnen."
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu wichtig, um keinen Einfluss auf meine Plänen im Sektor zu haben. Was bedeutet, dass wir entweder Verbündete oder Feinde sind. Mir wäre Ersteres lieber, und daher werden wir uns wiedersehen. Versucht, Euch an den Gedanken zu gewöhnen."

languages.text: "Önemli bir simasın, dolayısıyla sektöre yönelik planlarımı etkilememe ihtimalin yok. Bu da demek oluyor ki ya müttefikimsin ya da düşmanım. İlki olduğunu düşünmek isterim, o nedenle tekrar görüşeceğiz. Bu düşünceyi kabullenmeye çalış."
languages.original_text: "You are too prominent a figure for you not to affect my plans in the sector. Which means you are either my ally or my enemy. I would prefer to think you the former, so we will see each other again. Do try to get accustomed to this thought."

traits.locale_text: "Önemli bir simasın, dolayısıyla sektör hakkındaki planlarımı etkilememe ihtimalin yok. Bu da demek oluyor ki ya benim müttefikimsin ya da düşmanım. İlki olduğunu düşünmek isterim, o nedenle tekrar görüşeceğiz. Bu düşünceyi kabullenmeye çalış."
